Package entitytype

Interface EntityTypeSelection

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleEntityTypeSelection
public interface EntityTypeSelection
Data structure for managing the selection state of JPA entity types and related configuration.

Encapsulates methods for selecting and deselecting entity types, configuring prompt generators, and handling prompt formatting used for SQL query generation based on JPA models.

Allows storage and retrieval of selection states, prompt templates, and generator strategies.

Author:
Felix Seggeb√§ing

  • Field Details

    • DEF_DOMAIN_STRING_GENERATOR

      static final DomainStringGenerator DEF_DOMAIN_STRING_GENERATOR
      Default DomainStringGenerator instance used for domain string generation.

    • DEF_DATABASE_STRING_GENERATOR

      static final DatabaseStringGenerator DEF_DATABASE_STRING_GENERATOR
      Default DatabaseStringGenerator instance used for database string generation.

    • DEF_PROMPT_PREFIX

      static final String DEF_PROMPT_PREFIX
      Default prefix used for assembling prompts in SQL query generation.

      Introduces the user-defined prompt and provides instructions for generating an SQL SELECT statement based on the JPA metamodel and its mapped SQL schema.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEF_PROMPT_POSTFIX

      static final String DEF_PROMPT_POSTFIX
      Default postfix used for assembling prompts in SQL query generation.

      Contains instructions for formatting the generated SQL code and for restricting output to a pure SELECT statement without any extra comments or markup.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • setDomainStringGenerator

      void setDomainStringGenerator(DomainStringGenerator domainStringGenerator)
      Sets the DomainStringGenerator used for generating domain-specific string representations.
      Parameters:
      domainStringGenerator - the generator to use

    • setDatabaseStringGenerator

      void setDatabaseStringGenerator(DatabaseStringGenerator databaseStringGenerator)
      Sets the DatabaseStringGenerator used for generating database string representations.
      Parameters:
      databaseStringGenerator - the generator to use

    • setPromptPrePostfix

      void setPromptPrePostfix(String promptPrefix, String promptPostfix)
      Sets the prefix and postfix used for assembling prompts in SQL query generation.

      For reference, see DEF_PROMPT_PREFIX and DEF_PROMPT_POSTFIX.

      Parameters:
      promptPrefix - the prefix to use in the prompt
      promptPostfix - the postfix to use in the prompt

    • isEntityTypeSelected

      boolean isEntityTypeSelected(jakarta.persistence.metamodel.EntityType<?> entityType)
      Checks whether the given JPA entity type is currently selected.
      Parameters:
      entityType - the entity type to check
      Returns:
      true if the entity type is selected, false otherwise

    • setEntityTypeSelected

      void setEntityTypeSelected(jakarta.persistence.metamodel.EntityType<?> entityType, boolean selected)
      Sets the selection state of the given JPA entity type.
      Parameters:
      entityType - the entity type to modify
      selected - true to select the entity type, false to deselect it

    • getEntityTypes

      Set<jakarta.persistence.metamodel.EntityType<?>> getEntityTypes()
      Returns all available JPA entity types managed by this selection.
      Returns:
      a set of all available entity types

    • getFullPrompt

      String getFullPrompt(String prompt)
      Assembles the full prompt for SQL query generation by combining the configured prefix, the user-defined prompt, the postfix, the domain string and the database string.

      The resulting prompt consists of: the prefix, the user-provided prompt, ths postfix, the domain string (from DomainStringGenerator), and the database string (from DatabaseStringGenerator).

      Parameters:
      prompt - the user-defined prompt content
      Returns:
      the complete prompt string including all configured and generated parts

    • areAllSelected

      boolean areAllSelected()
      Checks whether all available entity types are currently selected.
      Returns:
      true if all entity types are selected, false otherwise

    • getSelectedEntityTypes

      Set<jakarta.persistence.metamodel.EntityType<?>> getSelectedEntityTypes()
      Returns the set of currently selected JPA entity types.
      Returns:
      a set of selected entity types

    • selectAll

      void selectAll()
      Selects all available JPA entity types.

    • deselectAll

      void deselectAll()
      Deselects all currently selected JPA entity types.
